parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful. Required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Time at initialization of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Used to identify user permission to execute API. Required for all requests

parameters.name: flash_id
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner. Is an path. Internally calculate.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of shop flash sale can want to set: 1: enabled, 2: disabled

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: Use identify for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error occurred

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error detail if hit error. Empty if no response

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description: The status of shop flash sale: 1: enabled, 2: disabled
